per_frame_init_1=count1 = .1666;
per_frame_init_2=count2 = .5;
per_frame_init_3=count3 = .8333;
per_frame_1=step = (.2+.2*bass_att)/fps;
per_frame_2=
per_frame_3=count1 = if(below(count1,1),count1+step,count1-1);
per_frame_4=count2 = if(below(count2,1),count2+step,count2-1);
per_frame_5=count3 = if(below(count3,1),count3+step,count3-1);
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=q1 = count1;

per_frame_9=q3 = count3;

per_frame_11=warp = .075;
per_frame_12=
per_frame_13=ob_g = .7+.3*sin(time*1.8);
per_frame_14=ob_b = .65+.25*sin(time*3);
per_frame_15=ob_r = .47+.3*cos(time*.75);
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=wave_a = 0;
per_pixel_1=wave1 = above(rad,q1)*below(rad,q1+.1666);
per_pixel_2=wave2 = above(rad,q2)*below(rad,q2+.1666);
per_pixel_3=wave3 = above(rad,q3)*below(rad,q3+.1666);
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=wave = wave1+wave2+wave3;
per_pixel_6=
per_pixel_7=zoom = zoom-.5*wave;
